Why now: these hit ahead of the next labor and inflation checkpoints (ADP/payrolls and core PCE), so even modest labor softening plus a sizable trade drag can shift the balance of risks toward “growth cooling” and reprice short-end expectations intraday.

What to watch: (1) continuing claims and next two weekly claims prints for confirmation vs noise; (2) USD reaction—risk-off USD strength can widen the deficit later vi
